data.name: The Nightmare from Beyond
data.detailed_description:
"The Nightmare from Beyond" is a cosmic-horror game inspired by various works of H.P. Lovecraft.

Note: This game was on hiatus for some time, but now it's finally back on development.
data.about_the_game:
"The Nightmare from Beyond" is a cosmic-horror game inspired by various works of H.P. Lovecraft.

Note: This game was on hiatus for some time, but now it's finally back on development.
data.short_description: "The Nightmare from Beyond" is a cosmic-horror game inspired by various works of H.P. Lovecraft.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i3 2.4Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 770 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i5 2.4Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 980 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional Notes: This title is compatible with 4K.
